name: KOKI
description: In Cameroon, blackeyed peas are either used to make koki beans or accra beans. They are hardly used for bean stew. We like grinding then and “hiding” themin ...

name: SUYA
description: Soya is beef that is marinated is spices and threaded on skewers then grilled.

name: Achu
description: Achu soup is a traditional food in Cameroon, a yellow soup. It is made with cocoyam. Spices, water, palm oil, and canwa or Nikki (limestone), and fish are other ingredients.

name: Kwakoko
description: Kwacoco Bible – made from grated coco yam and mixed with spinach, smoked fish, red oil and other spices. It is wrapped in plantain leaves, ...

name: Eru
description: It is the closest I have come to perfection. Made with Gnetum Africanun vines found in Central and West Africa Forest. Goes over Spinash and a variety of protein – Beef skin, beef, smoked fish and smoked baby shrimps
